ygData.subject: Just a game - maybe for some.
ygData.msgSnippet: I have seen a few people gentlely reminding me that EQ is  just a game . Speaking for myself when I was still playing, I was passionate about it.  I was
ygData.messageBody:
I have seen a few people gentlely reminding me that EQ is 'just a
game'.

Speaking for myself when I was still playing, I was passionate about
it. I was deadly serious about making Borix the best player
(regardless of equipment) that he could be. Probably why I felt
personally hurt by them nerf.

Damn, that sounds pathetic.

Chris Hennessy
cdhenness@... (remove '.nospam' when emailing)
___________________________________________________
All that is, ever was, will be, ever, twisting, turning through the never.
